Estate Agent

Independent London

Multi-Award-Winning SEO and PPC Agency focused on Data and Psychology

Our aim is to be the UK’s leading Data-driven and Psychology-focused B2B SEO and PPC agency. Watch our video here to find out more.

At novi, we prioritise people above and beyond everything else. Whether with our employees, our clients or their customers, we understand that relationships matter.

Through a combination of clear and frequent communication, combined with insights developed through the use of data analysis; we identify and understand the needs of our clients. We then focus on applying our information and experience to innovate and produce efficient and productive outcomes for our clients.

We recognise that innovation comes from skilled individuals taking pride in their work and so, with innovation in mind, we focus on employee well-being above and beyond all else. We do so to create a workplace with purpose and drive, working together to produce positive outcomes for our clients.

At novi we teach our clients how to innovate using data to continually refine our SEO Managementand PPC Management techniques. From our head office at Lancaster University and our London office at Level 18, Canary Wharf, we provide managed services, training and consultancy for local, national and international campaigns.

By working closely with our clients to fully utilise data and research, we take a holistic approach to SEO and PPC. This data-driven and psychology-focused approach gives us a solid foundation to inform ongoing strategy, to continually refine and improve our ongoing SEO and PPC campaign performance.

Brand Design

Why Choose Us

ThatViz prides ourselves on get you website up and running

Starting out & planning

We make it our primary concern to understand your vision through in-depth client brainstorming. This is your chance to show us what worked well, what not so well and what you’d like to achieve.

Wire framing

Every design has the customer in mind and our wire frames will document the customer journey from start to finish ensuring a natural flow and progression.

Look and feel

We work to your specifications to present an appealing design that captures the essence of your brand. Our code is written with the end design in mind as our designers are dual compliant as developers, resulting in clean code purposefully designed for your brand.

Theme build

Clean code equals fast websites. We use the best developer tools to ensure you theme is well engineered, top quality and consistent throughout all of your site and pages.

Testing and launch

All stores go through rigorous user acceptance testing and final quality assurance checks.

Considerations

Budget for your website as a start?

What type of website it will be?

Is it a new website or an existing website that you need to make changes on?

Do you need hosting or a domain?

Will it need to be SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) for security?

Do you need S.E.O (Search Engine Optimisation)?

Helping people and giving them an idea of want we can do for them in regards to branding and their online experience.
